name: Jamie Margolin
tweet:
Systems of exploitation caused the climate crisis.

Colonialism caused climate change.

Capitalism caused climate change.

Those who are at the top of those systems who exploit people and the earth are to blame for climate change.

 Not humanity in itself. Not ALL old people.

name: Jamie Margolin
tweet:
When we push this narrative of "climate change is the fault of ALL old people", it erases the work of indigenous elders & older community leaders who have been fighting for #climatejustice since before I was born.

We youth activists are standing on the shoulders of their work.

name: Jamie Margolin
tweet:
Older generations DID cause the climate crisis, but it is only certain members of them.

My grandma who grew up living off the land in Colombia, respecting every living thing around her didn't cause the #climatecrisis.

It's the POLITICIANS & CORPORATIONS, not "all old people."

name: Jamie Margolin
tweet:
I don't believe in pitting generations against each other. 

When people say "#boomers caused the climate crisis" it's actually 100 corporations that caused climate change. 

In order for the climate movement to be successful, we must be united and intergenerational.

tweet: And then there's #protest, which is how people with less access to resources and power challenge the political and economic system.  This tactic includes those taken by the #youth #climate #movement, including the #ClimateStrikes initiated by @GretaThunberg and @Fridays4future

name: Dana R Fisher
tweet: There's not much research that measures the direct effect of participation in these types of #lifestyle #movements as it relates to #climate outcomes, but see this work by @SwedishProtests and colleagues:  https://jspp.psychopen.eu/article/view/903Â â€¦

name: Dana R Fisher
tweet: Comparing data prior to #Election2016 (the ones in this new paper) to 2017 (100 days into the #TrumpAdministration, we find that #EchoChambers have shifted once more and formed around #climate #science and #denial.  In other words, no more echo chambers amplifying consensus.
